title: Server & Network - Configure New Firewall Rule
description: A client needs to allow a new third-party vendor to access a specific server on a specific port.

tasks.description: Obtain the vendor's public IP address, the internal server's IP address, and the required port number from the client's request.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has all the necessary information to create the firewall rule.

tasks.description: Log in to the client's firewall and create a new rule that allows traffic from the source IP to the destination IP on the specified port.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, specific, and secure firewall rule is created.

tasks.description: Verify the rule is working and have the client confirm the vendor can now access the server.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vendor confirms successful access, and the ticket is resolved.
